main event: A resident of Crockery Township, Nunica, Michigan, observed an unidentified flying object on the evening of 25 July 1958.
interesting points: The object was round, solid, and appeared to be white and red,The size of the object was comparable to that of a small automobile,The observer saw the object at an altitude of about 500 feet and watched it for approximately six minutes,The object flew in a straight line at high speed before disappearing over the tree line,The weather conditions were clear during the sighting.
sighted object: a round, solid object, white and red in color
witness description: a resident of Crockery Township with many hours as an observer for the GOC
